entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 2200 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Snow level rising to 1900 metres near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1900 metres. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
